mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MM WHERE MM_ID = #{mId}
SELECT MM_PW AS MPW FROM MM WHERE MM_ID = #{mId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AL(AL_MMID, AL_STCODE, AL_ACCESS) VALUES(#{mId},#{mStCode},SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT RQ.RQ_CODE AS rqCode, RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE AS rqFilterCode, RQ.RQ_MMID AS rqId, RQ.RQ_PERIOD AS rqPeriod, RQ.RQ_TITLE AS rqTitle, SG.SG_SUBNAME AS rqSubName, MG.MG_IMG AS rqImage, ST.ST_CODE AS rqStatus, RQ.RQ_SYSDATE AS RQSYSDATE FROM RQ INNER JOIN MG ON RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE = MG.MG_FILTERCODE INNER JOIN SG ON RQ.RQ_SUBCODE = SG.SG_SUBCODE INNER JOIN ST ON RQ.RQ_STCODE = ST.ST_CODE WHERE RQ.RQ_STCODE = 'B' ORDER BY RQ.RQ_SYSDATE DESC

SELECT RQ.RQ_MMID AS rqId, RQ.RQ_CODE AS RQCODE, SG.SG_SUBNAME AS RQSUBNAME, RQ.RQ_TITLE AS RQTITLE, MG.MG_IMG AS RQIMAGE, RQ.RQ_PERIOD AS RQDATE, COUNT(BI.BI_MMHELPER) AS RQBEST FROM RQ INNER JOIN MG ON RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE = MG.MG_FILTERCODE INNER JOIN SG ON RQ.RQ_SUBCODE = SG.SG_SUBCODE LEFT JOIN BI ON RQ.RQ_CODE = BI.BI_RQCODE GROUP BY RQ.RQ_CODE,RQ.RQ_TITLE, RQ.RQ_PERIOD, SG.SG_SUBNAME, MG.MG_IMG, RQ.RQ_MMID ORDER BY COUNT(BI.BI_MMHELPER) DESC
